subject: World Cup (Skiing)
lead_paragraph: Lindsey Vonn of the United States had one of the biggest victories of her career Saturday, easily winning the most prestigious downhill of the women’s World Cup circuit. Vonn covered the Olympia delle Tofane course in Cortina d’Ampezzo, Italy, in 1 minute 36.70 seconds, finishing 0.83 ahead of Anja Paerson of Sweden.
